oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pittenger. Frank Pittenger, Jim Polhemus and 'B' Nimick eating watermelon, 1941
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Frank Pittenger, Jim Polhemus and 'B' (Beatrice) Nimick (later Mrs. Jim Polhemus) eating watermelon in Mascot, Knox County, TN. 1941
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Watermelons; Recreation; Social life;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
